profile.title: Purofayela yemushandisi
profile.noPrivateKey: Hapana kiyi yakavanzika pane ichi chishandiso yekuendesa kunze.
profile.importFailed: Kutadza kuisa kiyi (password isiri iyo kana faira rine kukanganisika).
profile.keysRotated: Mapeya ekiyi matsva agadzirwa uye kiyi yeruzhinji yakakwidzwa.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Kiyi yako yakavanzika haimboenda kure nechishandiso ichi. Tumira kunze kopi ine password kuti uidzorere pane chimwe chishandiso.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Uri paFree—shandisa Sun/Moon pazasi nekukurumidza. Kwidza kuti uvhure mamwe madingindira.
profile.backupDesc: Gadzira ma-backup ane password emakiyi ako, wobva waadzorera pane chimwe chishandiso kuti usiyanise.
profile.followHint: Nyaya dzavo dzichaonekwa muFollowing feed yako kana vakaisa neaudience yeFollowers (kana Veruzhinji).
profile.callTextForwardingTitle: Kutumira Mberi Mafoni uye/ kana Meseji
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Tumira mafoni nemeseji anouya kufoni kana email yako yakasimbiswa. Anobuda anogona kuratidza nhamba yako yeChatforia.
profile.errSmsDest: Sarudza kanenge imwe nzvimbo yekuenda (foni kana email).
profile.errQuietHours: Maawa ekunyarara anofanira kuva pakati pe0 ne23.

chat.selectPrompt: Sarudza chinyorwa kana imba yekutaura kuti utange kutaura

premium.heading: Kwidza kuPremium
premium.description: Vhura maficha ane simba & bvisa maads.

auth.headline: Kutaura kwakachengeteka, kwepasi rose, nekududzira ipapo ipapo
auth.description: End-to-end encryption, kududzira kunofambiswa neAI, meseji dzinonyangarika, uye mafoni/ mavhidhiyo.

feature.privacy: Kutanga zvakavanzika. Data rako, kutonga kwako.

auth.desktopTip: Uri pa desktop? Skana nefone yako kuti uwane app.
auth.subhead: Kutaura kwakavanzika, kwakavharidzirwa, uye kunodudzirwa — ipapo ipapo.
auth.tip: Unogona kushandisa Chatforia pane chero mudziyo — kana kudhawunirodha app kuti uwane zvizere.
auth.scanHint: Skana kuti dhawunirodhe app kana kuvhura mubrowser.

press.title: Press
press.contact: Kune mibvunzo yevatori venhau, tibate pa press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Kune mibvunzo yevatori venhau, tibate pa press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia imeseja yakachengeteka ine kududzira ipapo ipapo uye E2E encryption, yakagadzirirwa kuita kuti nhaurirano dzenyika dzive dzakavanzika uye dzisanyanya kuoma.

careers.title: Mabasa
careers.intro: Tiri timu diki tichivaka meseja yepasi rose, yakavanzika. Kana uchinetseka nechengetedzo, kuwoneka, uye UX inofadza, tinoda kunzwa kubva kwauri.
careers.openRoles: Mabasa aripo: Engineering (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.

about.title: Nezve Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia imeseja yakachengeteka, ine mitauro yakawanda, ine end-to-end encryption, kududzira ipapo ipapo, uye mafoni/ mavhidhiyo. Chinangwa chedu chiri nyore: kubatsira vanhu kubatana—vakachengeteka, zvakavanzika, uye vachayambuka mitauro.

values.control: Kutonga: Meseji dzinonyangarika & zviziviso zvekverenga ndizvo zvaunosarudza.

about.howDescription: Meseji inovharidzirwa pachishandiso chako isati yabuda. Kududzira, ma-backup, uye kusiyanisa midziyo zvakagadzirwa zvekuti maseva edu anoona zvishoma sezvinobvira.

advertise.title: Shambadza neChatforia
advertise.description: Svika kune vashandisi vekutaura vane kubatikana nenzvimbo dzakanaka, dzine kuchengetedzwa kwebrand. Tinopa ma banner anzvimbo dzinoonekwa, sponsorships, uye house promos. Vanyori vePremium havambooni maads.

adsense.withPubId: Parizvino tiri kushandisa Google AdSense. Kana uchida kutitarisa kuburikidza neGoogle Ads, shandisa publisher ID {{pubId}} uye ukumbire managed placement pamayuniti ari pasi apa. Sponsorships dzakananga dziripo—shandisa fomu.
adsense.noPubId: Parizvino tiri kushandisa Google AdSense. Sponsorships dzakananga dziripo—shandisa fomu riri pasi.

advertise.noPlacements: Hapana mayuniti arongwa pari zvino. Awedzere mu ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Kudzoka kazhinji nekugara kwenguva yakareba muUI yechat
why.brandSafe: Mafomati akachengeteka kubrand; frequency capping rine rukudzo
why.sponsoredMoments: Sponsored moments (semuenzaniso, “Start a Chat” modal) iripo
why.deals: Zvirongwa zvakananga kana kuburikidza neAdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Ndatenda! Kubvunza kwako kwatumirwa. Tichakupindura munguva pfupi.
form.missingRequired: Ndapota zadza zita, email, uye meseji.
form.mailtoInfo: Kuvhura email client yako kuti utumire kubvunza…

upgrade.title: Kwidza
upgrade.subtitle: Vhura chirongwa chakakunakira: bvisa maads nePlus, kana uwane maficha ese ane simba nePremium.

gettingStarted.title: Kutanga
gettingStarted.subtitle: Uri mutsva kuChatforia? Gwara pfupi iri rinoratidza zvakakosha kuti ushande mukati memaminitsi.

alert.text: Gwara iri richakura patinotangisa maficha matsva. Kana pane chashoma, tizivise kuburikidza ne

section2.title: 2) Tanga kutaura
section2.item1: Gadzira DM kana Boka wotumira meseji yako yekutanga.
section2.item2: Shandisa kududzira ipapo ipapo kuti utaure mumitauro 100+.
section2.item3: Edza meseji dzinonyangarika uye zviziviso zvekverenga muPurofayela → Zvakavanzika.

section3.title: 3) Enda mberi
section3.item2Part1: Sungirira mimwe midziyo uye gadza ma-backup akavharidzirwa mu

account.a: Dhawunirodha app kana shandisa webhu, puruzira “Gadzira account”, simbisa email/ foni. Kudzorera, shandisa “Wakanganwa password”.

privacy.q: Meseji dzakavharidzirwa here kubva pakutanga kusvika pakuguma?
privacy.a: Ehe. Meseji nemafoni zvakavharidzirwa kubva pakutanga kusvika pakuguma nekukasira. Iwe chete nemugamuchiri munogona kuzviverenga.

translate.a: Batidza “Dudzira otomatiki” muZvirongwa → Chitarisiko & Mutauro. Tinodudzira pachishandiso panotsigirwa, kana kuburikidza nemaAPI akachengeteka ane metadata shoma.

contact.a: Tisvike pa support@chatforia.com. Sanganisira ma screenshot uye shanduro yeapp yako.

intro.body: Policy iyi inotsanangura kuti Chatforia (“isu”) inounganidza, inoshandisa, uye kugovera sei ruzivo paunoshandisa maapp edu nemasevhisi. Tinogadzira Chatforia kuti tideredze data ratinokwanisa kuona.

infoWeCollect.title: Ruzivo rwatinounganidza
infoWeCollect.account: Ruzivo rweaccount (semuenzaniso email/foni) kugadzira neku chengetedza account yako.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Zviri mukati zvakavharidzirwa (meseji/ mafoni) zvine end-to-end encryption; hatigoni kuzviverenga.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Diagnostics/ kushandiswa se crash logs, rudzi rwechishandiso, kana analytics diki kugadzirisa mashandiro.

howWeUse.title: Maitiro atinoshandisa ruzivo
howWeUse.provide: Kupa nekuchengetedza sevhisi (auth, kuona spam/ kushungurudza).

sharing.title: Kugovera
sharing.body: Hatisi kutengesa data remunhu. Tinogona kugovera data shoma nevanoita mabasa (semuenzaniso push notifications, analytics) pasi pezvibvumirano zvakasimba.

rights.title: Kodzero dzako
rights.body: Zvichienderana nenzvimbo yako (semuenzaniso, GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), unogona kukumbira kuwana, kugadzirisa, kudzima, kana kubuda pane mamwe maitiro. Taura: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Kuchengetwa kwedata & chengetedzo
retention.body: Tinongachengeta zvinodiwa kuti sevhisi ishande uye tinoshandisa chengetedzo yemaindasitiri. Zviri muE2E hazvigone kuverengwa nesu.

children.title: Vana
children.body: Chatforia haina kuitirwa vana vari pasi pe13 (kana sezvinodiwa nemutemo wenyika yako).

changes.title: Shanduko
changes.body: Tichaisa zvigadziriso pano uye kugadzirisa zuva re “Yakagadziridzwa musi”.

intro.body: Nekushandisa Chatforia unobvuma Mitemo iyi. Kana usingabvumirani, usabate sevhisi.

accounts.title: Maaccount
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Ipa ruzivo rwechokwadi uye chengetedza mapassword ako.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Iwe unotakura mutoro wezvinoitika paaccount yako.

acceptableUse.title: Kushandisa kunogamuchirika
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Hapana zviri pamutemo zvisiri izvo, kushungurudza, kana kukanganisa kodzero; hapana spam kana kushungurudza kwakazvimirira.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Tinogona kumisa/kumisa zvachose kana pane kutyora.

yourContent.title: Zviri zvako
yourContent.body: Unoramba uine kodzero pane zviri zvako. Unotipa kodzero dzinodiwa kuti sevhisi ishande (semuenzaniso, kutumira, kuchengetedza, kududzira).

disclaimer.title: Zvisimbiso & mutoro
disclaimer.body: Sevhisi inopihwa “zvazviri” pasina vimbiso. Pamusoro pezvinobvumidzwa nemutemo, Chatforia haina mutoro kune kukuvara kunobva zvisiri zvakananga kana kutevedzana.

changes.title: Shanduko
changes.body: Tinogona kugadzirisa mitemo iyi; kuramba uchishandisa mushure mechigadziriso zvinoreva kubvuma.

doNotSell.title: Usatengese kana Kugovera Ruzivo Rwangu Rwega
doNotSell.body: Chatforia haitengesi ruzivo rwega. Vagari veCalifornia vachiri kukwanisa kuendesa zvikumbiro pasi peCPRA vachishandisa bhatani riri pasi.

cookies.title: Zvirongwa zveCookies
cookies.body: Chatforia inoshandisa makuki mashoma (semuenzaniso, session, chengetedzo). Hatisi kushandisa makuki eads ebato rechitatu. Tora kutonga kwemakuki kuburikidza nezvirongwa zebrowser yako.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Hatina kukwanisa kurodha mamiriro enhamba yefoni.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Hapana nhamba yakapihwa. Sarudza ne area code kuti utange kutumira meseji.

startChatModal.title: Tanga hurukuro
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Nyora zita, username, foni, kana email…
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Nyora username kana foni wobva wadzvanya Tsvaga.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Nhamba dze foni/ email dzichawanikwa kana wadzichengetedza sevatauri.

sounds.freeNotice: Uri paFree — matoni ePremium anoonekwa asi akavharwa. Kwidza kuti uvhure zvese.

aiSettings.title: Marongedzo eAI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Tonga kududzira, mhinduro dzakangwara, uye mhinduro dzeForiaBot.
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Tumira AI meseji dzichangogamuchirwa (dzakacheneswa) kuti ipanere mhinduro dzemhanyi.
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Kana zvavhurwa, mhinduro dzeAI dzinodzoka dzichava nemashoko akatsvagwa akavanzwa

accessibilitySettings.title: Kuwanikwa & Ziviso dzeChiono
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Zvirongwa zvekuita kuti Chatforia ishande nyore pasina kutsamira panzwi.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Inotanga pahukuru hwakajairwa. Wedzera kana uchida mavara makuru muaccessibility.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Ziviso dzinoonekwa dzemeseji & mafoni
Ratidza mabhena uye kupenya kwechinyorwa kuti urege kupotsa zviito.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Vhaira pameseji itsva (panotsigirwa)
Dzamura kuvhaira kwemudziyo nezviziviso.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Penya skrini kana foni ichipinda
Kupenya kupfupi kana foni ichirira.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Dudzira (transcribe) voice notes otomatiki
Sungirira dudziro kumameseji e audio aunogamuchira.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Ratidza mabhena uye kupenya kwezita rebhawa kuti urege kupotsa chiitiko.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Chengeta ciphertext chete kuseva. Zvinodzima AI/Translate uye kutarisa kwemodhereshoni.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Tsvaga nezita, zita rekushandisa, kana foni
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Govera link yako yekukoka kuti mutange kutaura ipapo ipapo.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Ramba uri pedyo uchienda neChatforia yeiOS neAndroid.
peoplePage.syncTip: Zano: Meseji dzako dzinoramba dzakafanana pawebhu nepa mobile.

randomChat.title: Random Chat
randomChat.description: Sangana nemunhu mutsva ipapo ipapo. Tichakuwiriranisa tovhura imba yechat yenguva pfupi.
randomChat.saveGuard: Inongobvumirwa kuchengetwa kana chat iri pakati pevanhu vaviri chete
